persons: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
George VI, King of Great Britain
subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The British Grand Prix, first run in 1950 at Silverstone, was the inaugural race of the Formula One championship, and still holds a special place in the history of the series.
snippet: The British Grand Prix, first run in 1950 at Silverstone, was the inaugural race of the Formula One championship, and still holds a special place in the history of the series.
